about_the_game:
In the futuristic world of Kinetic Breakthrough, you play as Arin, an amputee with a high-tech arm enhancement given the mission of infiltrating a city taken over by ALAI, an artificial intelligence initially created to manage the city before suddenly going rogue and taking full control.

Expansive metroidvania levels




Explore the vast and unique areas of the city and interact with its inhabitants as Arin comes to uncover the nuanced, dynamic relationship between the city and ALAI.

Collision-based combat and fast-paced movement




Use both the arm's powerful recoil and its built in grappling force to hit and destroy enemy drones and robots in the city!
detailed_description:
In the futuristic world of Kinetic Breakthrough, you play as Arin, an amputee with a high-tech arm enhancement given the mission of infiltrating a city taken over by ALAI, an artificial intelligence initially created to manage the city before suddenly going rogue and taking full control.

Expansive metroidvania levels




Explore the vast and unique areas of the city and interact with its inhabitants as Arin comes to uncover the nuanced, dynamic relationship between the city and ALAI.

Collision-based combat and fast-paced movement




Use both the arm's powerful recoil and its built in grappling force to hit and destroy enemy drones and robots in the city!
name: Kinetic Breakthrough

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel / AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel / AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460 GTS / Radeon HD 7800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 recommended

short_description: Boost and grapple around a cyberpunk cityscape in Kinetic Breakthrough, a high-speed metroidvania. Use your momentum to break through windows, destroy drones, and confront the artificial intelligence that keeps the city under its control.
